channel.title: CVE Feed for SEIKO EPSON CORPORATION -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SEIKO EPSON CORPORATION -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-38556|2024-10-21T20:04:46.984Z -- seiko%20epson%20corporation -- seiko%20epson%20printer%20web%20config
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in SEIKO EPSON printer Web Config allows a remote attacker to turned off the printer. [Note] Web Config is the software that allows users to check the status and change the settings of SEIKO EPSON printers via a web browser. Web Config is pre-installed in some printers provided by SEIKO EPSON CORPORATION. For the details of the affected product names/model numbers, refer to the information provided by the vendor.

item.title: CVE-2024-47295|2024-10-01T14:01:18.787Z -- seiko%20epson%20corporation -- web%20config
item.description: Insecure initial password configuration issue in SEIKO EPSON Web Config allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to set an arbitrary password and operate the device with an administrative privilege. As for the details of the affected versions, see the information provided by the vendor under [References].

item.title: CVE-2024-47295|2024-10-01T03:16:40.052Z -- seiko%20epson%20corporation -- web%20config
item.description: Insecure initial password configuration issue in SEIKO EPSON Web Config allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to set an arbitrary password and operate the device with an administrative privilege. As for the details of the affected versions, see the information provided by the vendor under [References].
